Discover infinite worlds and build incredible things, from a simple home to huge castles. Play in creative mode with unlimited resources, or dig deep in survival mode as you craft weapons and armor to fend off dangerous creatures. Create, discover and survive alone or with friends on mobile or Windows 10.

EXPAND YOUR GAME:
Marketplace – Discover the latest community creations in the Marketplace. Get unique maps, skins and texture packs.

Slash Commands – Customize your game. You can assign items, summon creatures, change the time of day, and more.

Add-ons – With free add-ons you can further customize your game. If you’re tech-savvy, you can change the in-game data-based behavior to create new resource packs.

MULTIPLAYER
Realms – Play on Realms (your private server we host for you) with up to 10 friends – cross-platform, anytime, anywhere. Try a free in-app trial for 30 days.

Multiplayer – Play with up to 4 friends online with a free Xbox Live account.
Servers – Join free MMO servers and play with thousands of other players. Discover gigantic community worlds, compete against others in unique mini-games, and meet lots of new friends in lobbies.

SUPPORT: https:///www.minecraft.net/help
LEARN MORE: https:///www.minecraft.net/
